text.p: My name is Tetiana Legois and I'm Full Stack Developer.
During my 2,5 years of experience as a full-stack Web Developer, I have designed, coded, and implemented websites and web applications for a variety of clients.

My professional experience includes using programming languages such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Nextjs and Nodejs to create various features for client websites. I also have experience in developing and managing SQL and PSQL databases. Combine this with my ability to thrive in a collaborative environment, and I think that matches well with your requirements.

In addition, my background with working in development teams has given me the skills to adjust to the changing dynamics and processes of those environments while meeting scheduled milestones and deliverables.  I have experience of creating logical and innovative solutions to complex problems and am able to provide a full project management timeline and plan to suit project needs. I am precise in everything I do, and have an interest in technology and keeping up to date with industry standards and developments. I am a fast learner, responsible and ready for challenging tasks. Development, practice and work for the result are important for me.
